channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule

item.title: CVE-2021-25035|2024-08-03T19:49:14.533Z -- unknown -- backup%20and%20staging%20by%20wp%20time%20capsule
item.description: The Backup and Staging by WP Time Capsule WordPress plugin before 1.22.7 does not sanitise and escape the error parameter before outputting it back in an admin page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
